title: Canadian snowmobile registrations by province 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Province in the x axis and Number of registrations in the y axis.
The Number of registrations is highest at Province Quebec and lowest at Province Yukon.
The Number of registrations of Province Quebec is 111.76% larger than the minimum value at Yukon.
min_summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Province, and Number of registrations in each Province on the y axis.
Province Quebec has the highest Number of registrations and Yukon has the lowest Number of registrations.
